channel.title: BlueScar - A simple rsps!
channel.description:
---Info--- a RS like server, not "old school" or current. skilling,pvp,quests,ext has a tutorial island starting point, whole island works, nice npc dialogs. i like to make simple things that most servers overlook like, skill menus when clicking a skill icon rs quests npc's chatting to you
--Website-- [url=http://www.bluescar.site11.com]www.bluescar.site11.com[/url]
--Features-- Magic, all teleports require runes and give exp Skill menus (the popups you get when you click a skill) Quests in the quest tab can be clicked and the popup will appear with what or where you need to start the quest All npc's that have the talk option will talk to you and you can talk back castle wars fight pits pest control duel arena not many customs god wars bosses (just the npc's not the area, but also havnt decided if ill have god wars either way)
--Progress-- combat 20% Magic 70% Range 70% Player Clipping 0% npc clipping 10% overall non-combat skills 50%
--Update log-- 12/2/11 -added level requirements to teleport spells's -Cycle Based Event System Added! -Cook's Assistant Quest added! ------------------ --Pictures-- Cook's Assistant Quest Added! [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/405/96884865.png/][IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/9797/96884865.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/821/59245575.png/][IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/4385/59245575.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/856/16718288.png/][IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/129/16718288.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/713/72297907.png/] [IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/2961/72297907.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/545/51439076.png/] [IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/393/51439076.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/205/56207942.png/] [IMG]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/3179/56207942.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
-----LAST BIT OF INFO----- I cannot host this server when i finish it, so when i am done, i will be either releasing it for someone else to have or i will find someone to host it for me and help me with it, if you would like to host it for me and be the co-owner Pm me.
--REWARD-- for anyone that can add these TWO things to my server 1. near perfect Npc clipping 2. perfect Player clipping
REWARD is a rs account --stats--
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/191/skillsmm.png/][IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/5959/skillsmm.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/21/accountz.png/][IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/6397/accountz.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: BlueScar - A simple rsps!
item.dc:creator: @rangergodlv rangergodlv
item.description:
@rangergodlv wrote:

yes, its the account im offering as the reward, and

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:4, topic:423907”]I don’t think you’ll get anyone decent with offering a RuneScape account with those levels. :L[/quote] im not trying to get a hoster with that, im trying to find someone who will add player +npc clipping to my server.

Read full topic

item.title: BlueScar - A simple rsps!
item.dc:creator: @rangergodlv rangergodlv
item.description:
@rangergodlv wrote:

—Info—
a RS like server, not “old school” or current.
skilling,pvp,quests,ext
has a tutorial island starting point, whole island works, nice npc dialogs.
i like to make simple things that most servers overlook like,
skill menus when clicking a skill icon
rs quests
npc’s chatting to you

–Website–
www.bluescar.site11.com

–Features–
Magic, all teleports require runes and give exp
Skill menus (the popups you get when you click a skill)
Quests in the quest tab can be clicked and the popup will appear with what or where you need to start the quest
All npc’s that have the talk option will talk to you and you can talk back
castle wars
fight pits
pest control
duel arena
not many customs
god wars bosses (just the npc’s not the area, but also havnt decided if ill have god wars either way)

–Progress–
combat 20%
Magic 70%
Range 70%
Player Clipping 0%
npc clipping 10%
overall non-combat skills 50%

–Update log–
12/2/11
-added level requirements to teleport spells’s
-Cycle Based Event System Added!
-Cook’s Assistant Quest added!

–Pictures–
Cook’s Assistant Quest Added!

-----LAST BIT OF INFO-----
I cannot host this server when i finish it, so when i am done, i will be either releasing it for someone else to have or i will find someone
to host it for me and help me with it, if you would like to host it for me and be the co-owner Pm me.

–REWARD–
for anyone that can add these TWO things to my server

  1. near perfect Npc clipping
  2. perfect Player clipping

REWARD is a rs account
